summary: Build a minimalist modern blog website named “Gao Fitness Experience” for publishing fitness experience posts via a backend endpoint that accepts a title and content, with a footer stating all rights reserved to the brand/website name.
architectural_notes: No images are needed/required for the blog.

existing_features.title: Create a minimalist, modern, appealing blog frontend branded as “Gao Fitness Experience” that displays the list of posts (title, date, content) and updates when new posts are created.
Add a site-wide footer that includes an English “All rights reserved” notice using the website name as the brand: “Gao Fitness Experience”.
Define and apply a consistent minimalist visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) across the entire UI with a modern editorial feel; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create minimalist modern blog website UI for “Gao Fitness Experience” (no images needed).
Implement backend endpoint to create blog posts requiring title and content.
Add site footer with “All rights reserved” to the brand/website name (“Gao Fitness Experience”).
Implement backend data model and endpoints for blog posts so posts can be created via an endpoint that requires a title and content, and posts can be fetched for display on the site.
